活かる: (いかる) - (esp. 生かる, 活かる) to be arranged (flowers, etc.)/to be on display; (esp. 埋かる) to be buried
活き: (イキ) - (ant: 死に・1) living/being alive; freshness/liveliness/vitality; situation in which a group of stones cannot be captured because it contains contains two or more gaps (in go); (usually イキ) stet/leave as-is (proofreading); damned
活きじめ: (いきじめ) - fresh-frozen (e.g. fish); quickly frozen
活きる: (いきる) - to live/to exist; to make a living/to subsist; to be in effect/to be in use/to function; to come to life/to be enlivened; to be safe (in baseball, go, etc.)
活き作り: (いきづくり) - slicing a fish and presenting it at table in its original form; slices of fresh raw fish arranged to look lifelike
活き締め: (いきしめ) - (いきじめ only)  draining blood from a live fish (from above the gills and at the base of the tail) to keep it fresh; (esp. いきしめ)  fasting fish for several days to preserve flavour and quality (and reduce mortality during transport); (esp. いきしめ)  killing fish in a fishtank (immediately before cooking)/fish killed in a fishtank
活き造り: (いきづくり) - slicing a fish and presenting it at table in its original form; slices of fresh raw fish arranged to look lifelike
活く: (いく) - (v2k-k,v4k,vi)    to live/to exist; (v2k-s,vt)    to bring to life
活け〆: (いけしめ) - (いけじめ only) draining blood from a live fish (from above the gills and at the base of the tail) to keep it fresh; (esp. いけしめ) fasting fish for several days to preserve flavour and quality (and reduce mortality during transport); (esp. いけしめ) killing fish in a fishtank (immediately before cooking)/fish killed in a fishtank
活ける: (いける) - to arrange (flowers)/to plant; (生ける only) living/live
活け作り: (いけづくり) - slicing a fish and presenting it at table in its original form; slices of fresh raw fish arranged to look lifelike
活け炭: (いけずみ) - banked fire; live charcoal banked up and covered with ash
活け締め: (いけしめ) - (いけじめ only) draining blood from a live fish (from above the gills and at the base of the tail) to keep it fresh; (esp. いけしめ) fasting fish for several days to preserve flavour and quality (and reduce mortality during transport); (esp. いけしめ) killing fish in a fishtank (immediately before cooking)/fish killed in a fishtank
活け花: (いけばな) - flower arrangement; (せいか only) fresh flowers
活け造り: (いけづくり) - slicing a fish and presenting it at table in its original form; slices of fresh raw fish arranged to look lifelike
活け間: (いけま) - compartment in a fishing boat with seawater for reviving or keeping alive fresh fish or bait
活け魚: (いけうお) - live fish and shellfish (kept in a tank in a restaurant)
活じめ: (いきじめ) - fresh-frozen (e.g. fish); quickly frozen
活を入れる: (かつをいれる) - to apply the art of resuscitation (in judo, etc.); to breathe life into/to stimulate/to encourage someone/to give someone a pep talk
活を求める: (かつをもとめる) - to try to find a way out
活人剣: (かつにんけん) - life-saving sword (a killing sword may be a sword of life depending on how it is used)
活仏: (かつぶつ) - grand Lama; living Buddha
活作り: (いけづくり) - slicing a fish and presenting it at table in its original form; slices of fresh raw fish arranged to look lifelike
活写: (かっしゃ) - vivid description; painting a lively picture of
活劇: (かつげき) - action picture/action movie; riotous scene/street brawl
活動: (katsudou) - activity (de uma pessoa, organização, animal, vulcão, etc.), action
活動写真: (かつどうしゃしん) - moving picture (i.e. a movie; term esp. used during the silent movie period)
活動成果: (かつどうせいか) - results (of an activity)
活動的: (かつどうてき) - active; dynamic; energetic
活動範囲: (かつどうはんい) - sphere of action; scope of activity; range of work
活動誌: (かつどうし) - specialty magazine; information digest
活動過剰: (かつどうかじょう) - hyperactivity; overactivity
活字: (かつじ) - printing type/movable type; printed text/print
活字を組む: (かつじをくむ) - to set type
活字バー: (かつじバー) - type bar; printer bar
活字世論: (かつじせろん) - (yoji) public opinion (sentiment) as reflected in the print media
活字中毒: (かつじちゅうどく) - (yoji) addiction to the printed word; reading addict; book (print) junkie
活字体: (かつじたい) - printed form (of writing)/print; typeface
活字体で書く: (かつじたいでかく) - to print (on a press)
活字印刷: (かつじいんさつ) - type printing; letterpress printing; typography
活字文化: (かつじぶんか) - culture of the printed word; book culture
活字離れ: (かつじばなれ) - aliteracy; loss of interest in or shift away from reading (especially serious) books or literature
活弁: (かつべん) - narrator in Japanese silent cinema
活性アルミナ: (かっせいアルミナ) - activated alumina
活性中心: (かっせいちゅうしん) - active center
活性化: (かっせいか) - activation; stimulation; revitalization; invigoration
活性化エネルギー: (かっせいかエネルギー) - activation energy
活性文書型: (かっせいぶんしょがた) - active document type
活性炭: (かっせいたん) - activated charcoal; activated carbon
活性連結型: (かっせいれんけつがた) - active link type
活性酢酸: (かっせいさくさん) - active acetate
活性酸素: (かっせいさんそ) - reactive oxygen (i.e. free radicals, which can be destructive at high concentrations)
活歴: (かつれき) - variety of kabuki, based on historical events
活殺自在: (かっさつじざい) - (yoji) the power of life or death
活気づく: (かっきづく) - to become animated; to liven up; to become active
活気付く: (かっきづく) - to become animated; to liven up; to become active
活気付ける: (かっきづける) - to animate; to liven up
活気横溢: (かっきおういつ) - (yoji) being full of vitality (energy); in exuberant spirits; effervescent; ebullient
活溌: (かっぱつ) - vigor; vigour; active; lively
活溌溌地: (かっぱつぱっち) - (yoji) being full of vitality (energy); vigorous and in high spirits
活版屋: (かっぱんや) - a printer's; a printer
活版所: (かっぱんしょ) - printer's; print shop
活用語尾: (かつようごび) - conjugative suffix (i.e. "-iru" and "-eru" for ichidan verbs, "-i" for i-adjectives, etc.)
活発: (かっぱつ) - vigor; vigour; active; lively
活発化: (かっぱつか) - increase in activity; activation
